name: Jewel Candy Clash: Line Dash Puzzle Connect Game - by Cobalt Play Mania Games
name_original: Jewel Candy Clash: Line Dash Puzzle Connect Game - by Cobalt Play Mania Games
description:
Jewel Candy Clash : Line Dash Puzzle Connect Game - delicious food fun. Once you play this your mouth will be watering :) Connect all the matching candy's and jewels by drawing a line between them. Simple, relaxing puzzle fun which anyone can play.


FEATURES
- Hundreds of level and board sizes from 5x5 to 30x30.
- Easy single tap game play, anyone can play.
- Test your brain and improve your puzzle skills.
- Time trial mode.
- Beautiful and delicious food art work.


PLAYER REVIEWS
"great fun, the bigger boards are really challenging but im enjoying figuring them out" - app tapper - Dec 2, 2013

"i really like game where I dont have to work fast, i can just sit back and relax with this one, i recommend it" - ninja td - June 2, 2013


HOW TO PLAY
- Choose your board size in the level select screen.
- Connect matching items by dragging a line between them.
- Fill all the spaces on the board to move to the next level.


Players who love connect puzzle games like Flow Free 2 and Hexic Bridges will love this game too.

Have some puzzle fun :)
The Cobalt Play Mania Games Team
